WorkItem.Description:
This happens when a new user creates a post with a tag that doesn't have any approved stories attached to it.  Once the story is approved it works fine.

The error happens on line 10 in Coud.ascx.

int index = Convert.ToInt32(Math.Floor((tag.StoryCount / max) * cssClasses.Length));

Before the story is approved the value is 0 for max.  After the story is approved the value for max is one.
WorkItem.Summary: Cloud.ascx Error - Value was either too larger or too small for an Int32
